Create a report chunk for disability indicators

Source: R/10-report.R
report_op_disability.Rd

Create a report chunk for disability indicators

report_op_disability()

Value

A reporting chunk for disability indicators

Examples

  report_op_disability()
#> 
#> # Disability
#> 
#> ## Overall
#> 
#> ```{r wgPlot}
#> oldr::chart_wg(x = oldr::create_op_all(svy = svy), save.chart = FALSE)
#> ```
#> 
#> ```{r wgTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[75:79, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Overall disability',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Vision
#> 
#> ```{r visionTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[51:54, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to vision',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Hearing
#> 
#> ```{r hearingTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[55:58, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to hearing',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Mobility
#> 
#> ```{r mobilityTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[59:62, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to mobility',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Remembering
#> 
#> ```{r rememberingTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[63:66, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to remembering',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Self-care
#> 
#> ```{r selfCareTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[67:70, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to self-care',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_option = c('striped')) %>%
#>   kableExtra::add_header_above(c(' ' = 2, 'ALL' = 3, 'MALES' = 3, 'FEMALES' = 3))
#> ```
#> 
#> ## Communicating
#> 
#> ```{r communicatingTable}
#> knitr::kable(x = resultsDF[71:74, seq(from = 3, to = ncol(resultsDF), by = 1)],
#>   caption = 'Disability related to communicating',
#>   digits = 2,
#>   col.names = c('Indicator', 'Type', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL', 'Est', '95% LCL', '95% UCL')) %>%
